summary: In 18th century Russia,the naive and idealistic lieutenant Chernov meets Empress Catherine the Great who becomes infatuated with him and appoints him Chief of the Imperial Guard.
cast: Tallulah Bankhead|Charles Coburn|Anne Baxter|William Eythe|Vincent Price|Mischa Auer|Sig Ruman|Vladimir Sokoloff|Mikhail Rasumny|Paul Baratoff|Eugene Beday|Egon Brecher|Renee Carson|Harry Carter|Feodor Chaliapin Jr.|Victor De Linsky|Donald Douglas|George Du Count|Nestor Eristoff|Fred Essler|Sandra Foloway|Arno Frey|Eva Gabor|Mario Gang|Wilton Graff|Roxanne Hilton|Ann Hunter|Martha Jewett|Torben Meyer|Fred Nurney|John Russell|Dick Ryan|Sam Savitsky|George Shdanoff|Eugene Sigaloff|Dina Smirnova|Leonid Snegoff|Grady Sutton|Henry Victor|Michael Visaroff|Friedrich von Ledebur|Virginia Walker|Marek Windheim
keywords: psychotronic film|catherine the great|foreign language adaptation|royalty|russia
title: La zarina
